entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
